text: man-yag geuga geudaedeulgwa ihonhandamyeon geuui junimkkeseoneun geuleul wihae geudaedeulboda deo hullyunghan baeujadeul - (hananimkke) sunjonghaneun yeoseongdeul, midneun yeoseongdeul, (hananimkke) budanhi bogjonghaneun yeoseongdeul, nwiuchineun yeoseongdeul, gyeongbaehaneun yeoseongdeul, dansighaneun yeoseongdeul, nampyeon-eul ilh-eun yeoseongdeulgwa gyeolhonhaji anh-eun yeoseongdeul - lo daechesikyeo jusil jido moleul il-ila
